name: Azim Faruqi
story: Ismail grew up in a small village in Afghanistan. He was trained as a fighter at a young age, and joined the Taliban when he was just 18 years old. After several years of fighting, he became disillusioned with the Taliban's tactics and left the group. He eventually found his way to Iran, where he met his wife and started a family. When the opportunity arose to join the OPFOR army, he saw it as a chance to use his skills for a greater cause.
